title: Designer Alessandro Michele’s New Bob on the Gucci Fall 2017 Runway - Vogue

organizations.name: gucci fall 2017 runway - vogue this milan

text: This Milan Designer Just Revealed the Most Shocking Haircut of the Season February 22, 2017 11:17 PM by Sophie Schulte-Hillen Photo: Getty Images With resident male grooming bellweather, Jared Leto , now officially a front-row fixture at Gucci , Alessandro Michele’s own well-timed haircut almost slipped through the cracks. But when the designer took a bow at this afternoon's fall 2017 show, followers familiar with his trademark look did a double take. Gone were his waist-length tangle of waves—the kind It-Girls only dream of achieving with regular trims and weekly deep-conditioning treatments. In its place, he revealed a mussed shoulder-grazing bob, which he paired with a Yankees cap, beat-up Gucci T-shirt, and signature scruffy beard. The latter was a far cry from the clean-shaven male model cast that walked Michele's runway, but really, isn’t that a designer’s prerogative? It's safe to say today’s come-as-you-are message just got a little louder.
